title: Credit union, Katy ISD to host 2019 ‘Teacher of the Year’ luncheon
title_page: Credit union, Katy ISD to host 2019 ‘Teacher of the Year’ luncheon
maintext:
Brazos Valley Schools Credit Union, in partnership with Katy ISD, will honor outstanding teachers from each campus who have demonstrated excellence and leadership among their peers and in their classrooms at the 2019 “Teacher of the Year” luncheon on April 18 at the Merrell Center.
This event will offer sponsors an opportunity to showcase their business to the community as we continue the long-standing tradition of honoring the Teacher of the Year winners from all 68 KISD campuses.
Brazos Valley Schools Credit Union is seeking sponsors to help support this event and are offering several levels of participation for area businesses. All sponsorship money will go toward hosting the Teacher Luncheon and providing gifts for the winning recipients at each campus.
For more information about the 2019 “Teacher of the Year” luncheon, visit https://katyteacheroftheyear.eventbrite.com or contact Lisa McGarity at 281-644-3650.
For more information about Brazos Valley Schools Credit Union, call 281-391-2149 or visit www.bvscu.org.
